name: End Of Life Planning
description: We prepare End-of-Life Planning documents for any of our eligible clients. Depending on your situation, you will likely benefit from some combination of these documents: Will, Trust, Revocable Transfer on Death Deed, Power of Attorney, Designation of Beneficiary, or Advanced Health Care Directive. Establishing an end-of-life plan is an important step in ensuring your wishes are kept a top priority, even if you are not able to advocate for them.
